languages.text: {n}Осушив кубок и шумно фыркнув, Абеляр со старательной веселостью произносит:{/n} "Знаю я одну корабельную песню, приличествующую хорошей пирушке..." {n}Увидев мрачные физиономии окружающих, он сникает.{/n} "...Да впрочем ее, поди, любят одни пустотники, а здесь компания иная".

{n}After draining his cup and noisily clearing his throat, Abelard says with studied joviality,{/n} "I know one shanty that always goes down a treat at parties..." {n}He looks at the grim countenances around him and seems to lose heart.{/n} "But it's only a favourite among voidsmen, I dare say, not a good choice for present company."
languages.original_text: {n}Осушив кубок и шумно фыркнув, Абеляр со старательной веселостью произносит:{/n} "Знаю я одну корабельную песню, приличествующую хорошей пирушке..." {n}Увидев мрачные физиономии окружающих, он сникает.{/n} "...Да впрочем ее, поди, любят одни пустотники, а здесь компания иная".

traits.locale_text: {n}After draining his cup and noisily clearing his throat, Abelard says with studied joviality,{/n} "I know one shanty that always goes down a treat at parties..." {n}He looks at the grim countenances around him and seems to lose heart.{/n} "But it's only a favourite among voidsmen, I dare say, not a good choice for present company."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德将酒一饮而尽，随后清了清嗓子，故作愉悦地开了口。{/n}“我知道有首小调，聚会的时候很受欢迎……”{n}他看着周围人严峻的表情，随后仿佛泄了气一般。{/n}“不过我得说，这首歌只在船员之中才比较受欢迎。考虑到目前的情况，恐怕有点不太合适。”
languages.original_text: {n}After draining his cup and noisily clearing his throat, Abelard says with studied joviality,{/n} "I know one shanty that always goes down a treat at parties..." {n}He looks at the grim countenances around him and seems to lose heart.{/n} "But it's only a favourite among voidsmen, I dare say, not a good choice for present company."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德将酒一饮而尽，随后清了清嗓子，故作愉悦地开了口。{/n}“我知道有首小调，聚会的时候很受欢迎……”{n}他看着周围人严峻的表情，随后仿佛泄了气一般。{/n}“不过我得说，这首歌只在船员之中才比较受欢迎。考虑到目前的情况，恐怕有点不太合适。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}カップを飲み干し、騒々しく喉を鳴らしたアベラルドは不自然な陽気さで話す。{/n}「パーティーで必ず盛り上がる歌をひとつ知っているのですが…」{n}彼は周りの険しい表情を見て、落胆する。{/n}「ですが、それはヴォイドマンたちの間で愛されているだけで、現在の仲間にはふさわしくないもののようですな」
languages.original_text: {n}After draining his cup and noisily clearing his throat, Abelard says with studied joviality,{/n} "I know one shanty that always goes down a treat at parties..." {n}He looks at the grim countenances around him and seems to lose heart.{/n} "But it's only a favourite among voidsmen, I dare say, not a good choice for present company."

traits.locale_text: {n}カップを飲み干し、騒々しく喉を鳴らしたアベラルドは不自然な陽気さで話す。{/n}「パーティーで必ず盛り上がる歌をひとつ知っているのですが…」{n}彼は周りの険しい表情を見て、落胆する。{/n}「ですが、それはヴォイドマンたちの間で愛されているだけで、現在の仲間にはふさわしくないもののようですな」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras apurar la copa y carraspear sonoramente, Abelard anuncia con jovialidad premeditada:{/n} «Conozco una canción que siempre es un éxito en las fiestas...». {n}Al ver los severos rostros que le rodean, parece perder la moral.{/n} «Pero solo es popular entre marineros del vacío, y por lo tanto no sería apropiada en esta compañía».
languages.original_text: {n}After draining his cup and noisily clearing his throat, Abelard says with studied joviality,{/n} "I know one shanty that always goes down a treat at parties..." {n}He looks at the grim countenances around him and seems to lose heart.{/n} "But it's only a favourite among voidsmen, I dare say, not a good choice for present company."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras apurar la copa y carraspear sonoramente, Abelard anuncia con jovialidad premeditada:{/n} «Conozco una canción que siempre es un éxito en las fiestas...». {n}Al ver los severos rostros que le rodean, parece perder la moral.{/n} «Pero solo es popular entre marineros del vacío, y por lo tanto no sería apropiada en esta compañía».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après avoir vidé son verre, Abélard se racle bruyamment la gorge et déclare sur un ton d'une jovialité calculée :{/n} « Je connais une chanson qui fait toujours son petit effet dans les soirées... » {n}Mais il semble perdre son enthousiasme en voyant les mines déconfites autour de lui.{/n} « Enfin, c'est surtout un chant qu'affectionnent les cosmomarins. Tout bien réfléchi, il ne vous plairait certainement pas... »
languages.original_text: {n}After draining his cup and noisily clearing his throat, Abelard says with studied joviality,{/n} "I know one shanty that always goes down a treat at parties..." {n}He looks at the grim countenances around him and seems to lose heart.{/n} "But it's only a favourite among voidsmen, I dare say, not a good choice for present company."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir vidé son verre, Abélard se racle bruyamment la gorge et déclare sur un ton d'une jovialité calculée :{/n} « Je connais une chanson qui fait toujours son petit effet dans les soirées... » {n}Mais il semble perdre son enthousiasme en voyant les mines déconfites autour de lui.{/n} « Enfin, c'est surtout un chant qu'affectionnent les cosmomarins. Tout bien réfléchi, il ne vous plairait certainement pas... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nachdem Abelard seinen Becher geleert und sich laut geräuspert hat, sagt er mit aufgesetzter Heiterkeit:{/n} "Ich kenne ein Matrosenlied, das auf Feiern immer gern gesungen wird ..." {n}Daraufhin schaut er sich um und erkennt nur missmutige Gesichter. Auch er scheint den Mut zu verlieren.{/n} "Aber eigentlich ist es nur unter Raumfahrern beliebt und ich bezweifle, dass es in unserer aktuellen Runde gut ankommt."
languages.original_text: {n}After draining his cup and noisily clearing his throat, Abelard says with studied joviality,{/n} "I know one shanty that always goes down a treat at parties..." {n}He looks at the grim countenances around him and seems to lose heart.{/n} "But it's only a favourite among voidsmen, I dare say, not a good choice for present company."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem Abelard seinen Becher geleert und sich laut geräuspert hat, sagt er mit aufgesetzter Heiterkeit:{/n} "Ich kenne ein Matrosenlied, das auf Feiern immer gern gesungen wird ..." {n}Daraufhin schaut er sich um und erkennt nur missmutige Gesichter. Auch er scheint den Mut zu verlieren.{/n} "Aber eigentlich ist es nur unter Raumfahrern beliebt und ich bezweifle, dass es in unserer aktuellen Runde gut ankommt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, kadehini bitirdikten ve gürültülü bir şekilde boğazını temizledikten sonra sahte bir neşeyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Partilerde çok iyi giden bir şarkı biliyorum." {n}Çevresindekilerin kasvetli yüz ifadelerine bakıyor ve görünüşe göre cesareti sönüyor.{/n} "Fakat sadece uçsuz erleri arasında popülerdir. Mevcut topluluğumuz için iyi bir tercih olmayabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}After draining his cup and noisily clearing his throat, Abelard says with studied joviality,{/n} "I know one shanty that always goes down a treat at parties..." {n}He looks at the grim countenances around him and seems to lose heart.{/n} "But it's only a favourite among voidsmen, I dare say, not a good choice for present company."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, kadehini bitirdikten ve gürültülü bir şekilde boğazını temizledikten sonra, eğitimli bir neşeyle konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Partilerde çok iyi giden bir şarkı biliyorum." {n}Çevresindekilerin kasvetli yüz ifadelerine bakıyor ve görünüşe göre cesareti sönüyor.{/n} "Ama sadece uçsuz erleri arasında popülerdir. Mevcut topluluğumuz için iyi bir tercih olmayabilir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
